subject: Haptic mounting bracket
description_text: Hello, If I want to order the plus x pedals with the VAM Pro Linear Motor set. I can only order brackets for the throttle and brake pedal but not for the clutch pedal. Is that one not needed? Thanks in advance! Greetings, Dennis

conversations.body_text: Hi Dennis Hoek,  By default, we provide a vertical mounting bracket with the product. A horizontal mounting bracket needs to be purchased separately. However, the clutch already comes with a horizontal bracket, so no additional purchase is required.Â

Hi! Thank you for your fast reply. I have them ordered! Greeting, Dennis Op 13 dec 2025 06:44 schreef support@simsonn.com: 
 
 Hi Dennis Hoek, By default, we provide a vertical mounting bracket with the product. A horizontal mounting bracket needs to be purchased separately. However, the clutch already comes with a horizontal bracket, so no additional purchase is required.
